segments.text: Look ! There are playing The Matrix today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are right , look at the crowd . Do you think we will be able to get tickets ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . If we can't , we can buy from ticket scalpers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No way . I'd rather go to another movie house .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on . We are already here . Besides , I really wanna see this picture .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Let's see when the next movie is playing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Seven thirty . There is only 10 minutes left and look at the long line !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What can you expect with this crowd ? I am praying that no one will cut in the line .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope not . We are getting closer .. two more ... one more ... it's our turn .
segments.speaker: S1
